medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset abdominal pain and nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began around 5 PM last night with a burning sensation in the epigastric region. Pain reduced temporarily by sitting up or leaning forward, but did not resolve. The patient experienced two episodes of vomiting and has been unable to eat or drink due to ongoing nausea and pain.
